sentences: Marquart was a drummer in the rock band A Flock of Seagulls, active during the 1980s.
In the mid 2000s, Marquart founded the rock band A Bad Think.
Marquart grew up in the town of Fort Atkinson, Wisconsin and first rock band was Wonderhorse where he played drums.
As a self-taught guitarist, he played in bars during his adolescent years.
In 1989, he temporarily played drums for the new wave band A Flock of Seagulls, and in 1990 recorded four songs with Alias as a drummer before moving to Virginia Beach, Virginia.
Marquart also has a daughter named Samantha, who is currently studio manager at Windmark Recording.
